description: This file defines a custom Document class for a Next.js application, extending the default Document to customize server-side rendering of the HTML document structure.

classes.name: MyDocument
classes.description: A custom document class extending Next.js's Document to customize the HTML structure and initial props.

methods.name: getInitialProps
methods.description: An async static method that retrieves initial properties for server-side rendering by invoking the superclass method.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Render method that returns the custom HTML structure for the page, including language attribute, head, main content, and scripts, with a custom body class.
